events.message: I recently received my order but would like to request a refund as the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund cluster due to customer's request for a monetary return.
An agent specialized in refunds has been assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request and will do my best to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item didn’t work as described and I would prefer to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return instructions shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the item back today.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case resolution.
Since you confirmed everything is in order, I am closing this case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
